OOC: Rat Trap was trying to tap in to see if he could manually crash the pr=
ogram remotely, to see if that would allow Rodimus's original programming t=
o once again recover.  Ah, doesn't have to happen that way of course.. 

BI=
C: 

Hearing Kup's voice was comforting to Tucson It had been a long time s=
ince he heard the old Autobot speak.  He smiles while replying to him.

"Ac=
tually Kup, I think I like your idea better.  By the way, it's great to hea=
r from you again.  I'll be there as soon as I can manage it."

Rat Trap and=
 Quickstride prepare to exit the shuttle, as they get into beast modes.  Ra=
t Trap leaps up onto Quickstride's back and grabs his mane.  The stallion s=
norts a few times as dust gets into his nostrills.

"Gazoontite.  Anyway, y=
ou can count on us Lord Elder.  We promise, we'll watch our backs every ste=
p of the way."

Quickstride shakes his head after sneezing.

" We won't do =
anything you wouldn't do, Sir.  We'll have to move fast though, Lord Perseu=
s probably needs us ASAP."

Rat Trap opens the hatch door while on Quickstr=
ide's back.

"Wish us luck guys.  We're gonna need it."

Quickstride canter=
s off the ramp and onto open land.  His hooves kick up clouds of dust behin=
d him.  His canter soon evolves into a full blown gallop.  The sound of hoo=
f beats carries through the air as it fades into the distance the farther h=
e gallops.

Tucson turns to Lord Elder.

" I think we should leave the shut=
tle where it is and head toward the Ark on wheels.  We can cover more groun=
d that way.  Plus, it's been a while since I've done any form of off road d=
riving and if we keep off the main roadways, no one will ever suspect that =
we've gone back to the Ark instead of taking the bait."  

He transforms in=
to his SUV mode and opens his door to Lord Elder.

"So who wants shotgun?"
=



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote=
:
>
> With a steady hand and the help of Tuscon, Lord Elder brought the
> s=
huttle down to a relatively safe landing. There was only the
> slightest ja=
rring bump as they touched ground. Shutting down power to
> the engines Lor=
d Elder turned to look at the others.
> 
> "Quickstride and Rat Trap." he s=
aid gravely, "Report to Lord Perseus
> at the old base, either he or Legacy=
 should be able to fill you in on
> the situation there." Elder glanced at =
the computer screen which still
> showed a minion flying above the old base=
.
> 
> "Be very careful. Minions are not Autobots and are more than
> Decep=
ticons or Predacons, and are not to be underestimated."
> 
> Elder looked a=
t Tuscon although he was still talking to Quickstride
> and Rat Trap, "Reme=
mber the war we just fought a short while ago to
> protect the Ark from fro=
m the Minion's attack? At that time Cyclonus
> was a hearld of Unicron hims=
elf. With the power Unicron was giving him
> he was able to defeat Rodimus =
Prime." Elder frowned, "We think it was
> that defeat that allowed Hydras t=
o capture Rodimus and turn him into
> what he is now."
> 
> Turning to look=
 at the screen and then at Rat Trap and Quickstride
> Elder continued, "If =
this Minion is willing to take on the entire base
> by himself, he may be t=
hat powerful as well, or even more so."
> 
> Elder turned to look at Tuscon=
 once again, "As for mucking around with
> Predacon shell programs, hmmmm."=
 he said thoughtfully. "We have not
> had that much success with reversing =
them." Elder tapped his finger
> idly on the console, "Remember when Optimu=
s Primal first crashed here
> on old Earth? Megatron had been able to beat =
us to some of the Maximal
> pods, and use his shell program to turn them in=
to Predacons." Elder
> sighed, "Some of them are still on his side today."
=
> 
> "I'm not saying it's impossible, I'm just saying that it's going to be=

> difficult." Elder said as he looked around at everyone.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> =
(OOC: I am not sure what Tuscon and Rat Trap were trying to do, when
> they=
 were attempting to 'tap into Rodimus via Predacon code'??)
